org.jetlang.channels
Interface Subscriber<T>

Type Parameters:
T - Type of messages a subscription will be for
All Known Subinterfaces:
Channel<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
MemoryChannel
public interface Subscriber<T>

Interface for components that allow for message subscriptions

Method Summary
 Disposable subscribe(DisposingExecutor executor, Callback<T> receive)
          Subscribe to receive messages produced by this subscriber
 Disposable subscribe(Subscribable<T> sub)
           
 

Method Detail

subscribe

Disposable subscribe(DisposingExecutor executor,
                     Callback<T> receive)
Subscribe to receive messages produced by this subscriber

Parameters:
executor - DisposingExecutor to use for invoking the callback upon message receipt.
receive - Callback to invoke upon message receipt
Returns:
Disposable that can be invoked to cancel this subscription

subscribe

Disposable subscribe(Subscribable<T> sub)
